title: BRIEF-VW Says Expects Australian Diesel Class Action To Be Completed By Early 2020
text:
BRIEF-VW Says Expects Australian Diesel Class Action To Be Completed By Early 2020

Commodities 3 hours ago (Sep 16, 2019 15:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-VW Says Expects Australian Diesel Class Action To Be Completed By Early 2020 Sept 16 (Reuters) - Volkswagen AG : * ON AUSTRALIAN DIESEL SETTLEMENT SAYS CO EXPECTS CLASS ACTION LAWSUITS PROCESS TO BE COMPLETED BY EARLY 2020, EXPECTS CIVIL LAWSUIT WITH REGULATORS TO BE COMPLETED BY END OF 2019 Further company coverage: VOWG_p.DE (Berlin Speed Desk)

BRIEF-VW Says Expects Australian Diesel Class Action To Be Completed By Early 2020
description: BRIEF-VW Says Expects Australian Diesel Class Action To Be Completed By Early 2020
